lyric.verse: Moshi mo negai ga kanau no naraba Shiroi hane no tsuita fune ni notte Tooi tooi doko ka de naiteru ano ko Mukae ni ikeru Moshi mo hoo ga tsukaeru no naru Hai-iro mado no kurai keshiki wo Ano ko no daisuki na iro shita hana de Kazareru no ni
lyric.chorus: Takaramono mo moohu mo iranai Suteki na kutsu mo nee iranai yo Tokubetsu na no wa kimi no kuchitzuke
lyric.verse: Hajimete kiita uta wo utatte Mikakedaoshi no otonatachi ni Samishii bakari no kogoeru yoru no Tomete miseru
lyric.chorus: Dakara doo ka boku wa aishite Kobareru kurai egao wo misete Takaramono mo moohu mo iranai Tadame no ko wo dakishimetai yo
